SA11sanss16u:5_0: grahītāraḥ subahavaḥ svalpaṃ cêdam anena kiṃ /

SA11sanss16u:42_0: utpalaṃ vārimadhye vā so 'nupūrveṇa vardhatae /ity ādi //

SA11sanss16u:49_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâlpam api dānaṃ dadatā sarvasatveṣu sarvâkārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyapariṇāmanatāyām aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /

SA11sanss16u:240_0: vimarṣanirāsāya dharmasaṃgītisūtre gaditaṃ /āśaye samyag bhagavan buddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ /

SA11sanss16u:242_0: āśayasaṃpannasya punar bhagavan yadi buddhā na bhavanti gaganatalād dharmaśabdo niścarati kuḍmavṛkṣebhyaś ca /

SA11sanss16u:245_1: tad yathā bhagavan yasyôttamâṅgaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ evam eva bhagavan yasyâśayas tasya buddhabodhiḥ /
SA11sanss16u:246_0: tad yathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ /
SA11sanss16u:247_0: evam eva bhagavan yasyâśayas tasya buddhatvalābhaḥ /
SA11sanss16u:252_0: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati bodhisatvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti /
SA11sanss16u:256_0: tad yathā bhagavan satsv abhramegheṣu varṣaṃ varṣaty asatsu na varṣati /
SA11sanss16u:257_0: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati buddhadharmāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanss16u:258_0: tad yathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti /

SA11sanss16u:260_0: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisatvena buddhabodhyarthikena svâśayaḥ sûdgṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavyêti /
SA11sanss16u:307_0: tad evaṃ vyavasāyâśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraskṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye //
SA11sanss16u:309_0: atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /

SA11sanss16u:323_0: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatrôditā bhavati tatrânyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhava-
SA11sanss16u:326_0: tad yathā bhagavan sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ manasâdhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati /

SA11sanss16u:331_0: tad yathâpi nāma bhadanta sāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitêndriyasyâśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvaṃgamāḥ /
SA11sanss16u:332_0: evam eva bhadanta sāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamāḥ //
SA11sanss16u:336_0: no vā gṛhapater vâikaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema /

SA11sanss16u:339_0: svakam anekavidhaṃ pūrvânubhūtam anubhūyamānaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svâtmany atyantam aniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā /
SA11sanss16u:340_0: priyâdiṣu maitrī maitrīvatā bhāvayitavyā pratyutpannaduṣkhavyādhiṣu mahāduṣkhasāgarânavadhidīrghasaṃsāravyasanânunīteṣu vā /

SA11sanss16u:343_0: yeṣām asaṃkhyeyâtmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca /
SA11sanss16u:344_0: evaṃ ca kṣīyamāṇā kāye na nirvedam utpādayanti /
SA11sanss16u:362_0: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegam āpadyante bahūni duṣkhāni pratyanubhavantaḥ /

SA11sanss16u:365_0: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhārôpacayena saṃbhṛtenême sarvasatvâbhyantaviśuddhim anuprāpnuyur iti //
